articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Commemorations open with a military procession watched by WW2 veterans, royals and huge crowds.
articles.title: Royals, veterans and a packed Mall: VE Day at 80 in pictures

articles.description: Bulgarians Orlin Roussev, Biser Dzhambazov and Katrin Ivanova attended an event in the Palace of Westminster, the BBC finds.
articles.title: Convicted Russian spies attended Brexit event in Parliament

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: President Trump says the famous island prison off San Francisco is to be reopened to house "ruthless and violent" offenders.
articles.title: Trump orders reopening of notorious Alcatraz prison

articles.description: It comes as moviemakers worry the UK's thriving film industry could be hit by the new tariff threat.
articles.title: Trump film tariffs to be part of UK-US trade talks

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: As Trump turns his attention to what he calls the "dying" US film industry, his solution has provoked strong reactions.
articles.title: Trump film tariffs: What next for Hollywood and beyond?

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The Israeli military has called up tens of thousands of reservists, saying it is aiming to increase pressure on Hamas.
articles.title: Israel security cabinet approves plan to expand Gaza offensive

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Richard Irvine runs a smokehouse in Colonsay but is giving it away to help regenerate the local population.
articles.title: 'I'm giving my fish smoking business away to benefit Colonsay'

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Layton's family say he was a "cheeky, happy lad" with a "heart of gold".
articles.title: Layton Carr: Family's tribute to 'loving boy' killed in Bill Quay fire

articles.description: Danny Cahalane, 38, was described as an "outstanding father and son" by his family.
articles.title: Plymouth acid attack victim dies in hospital

articles.description: Marcel Ciolacu told his colleagues their government had no credibility after presidential elections.
articles.title: Romanian PM and party quit government after nationalist vote win
